hero.title: What is Vriends?
hero.description: Vriends is an application that allows you to keep track of your friendships. Vriends can be used to store useful information about your friends like gift idea's or even birthdays.

cards.title: Maintain your friendships
cards.description: Each friendship is represented with a flower. Friendships, like all things, need maintenance. If you don't see or speak with your friends, the flower will lose its petals.

cards.title: Give life to your friendship
cards.description: By holding down a flower, you are letting the app know you have seen a friend, the petals will grow back.

cards.title: Don't let the flower wither away
cards.description: The speed at which your flower deteriorates depends on how much you want to see your friend, once a week, once a month? That's up to you!

cards.title: No personal data needed
cards.description: Vriends is an open source application which works 100% offline. We do not need any information or accounts. This means all data is stored on your device and nowhere else.
